title: Dui hazzar bwswrni sigangao
lyrics:
Dui hazzar bwswrni sigangao
Swithw jugni amwlnw goali no-ao, goali no-ao 
No-bang gwiya badi mwswuni goaliao jwnwm labai -2
(A)
Dongkhayw mwn Nabifwrni Bijabao -2
Dongkha tharwmwn,Dongtharkaywmwn
Lerjakhadwng mwn, dinthi jadwng mwn -2
(B)
Hathorkia lingbwbai Gwnwkhwfwrkhou -2
Mwswu goliao, naodra sayao
Gugrup khulumbai, Jiuni Rajakhou -2
(C)
Neywi neywi nuaswi Simion-a -2
Jisu gothokhou bamnw mwnaswi
Bamnw mwnanwi, rongzaswa swi -2
